abstract: Former Los Angeles Kings center Mike Richards is charged with possession of controlled substance in Emerson, Manitoba.
lead_paragraph: Richards, an N.H.L. free agent whose contract was terminated by the Los Angeles Kings, was charged Tuesday with possession of a controlled substance.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Mike Richards Faces Drug Charge
